title: VR-Based Math e-Learning Quality Evaluation Design for Korean Adult Learners

context.prior_knowledge: Grasp of basic mathematical concepts and experience with digital devices
context.additional_context: Mathematics Competency Strengthening Course for Current Practitionersâ€™ Workplace Application. Providing Hands-On Learning Experiences in Simulation/VR Environments

learning_goals: Adult learners can evaluate the quality of VR-based e-learning across seven dimensions: interactivity, staff support, institutional quality management, institutional credibility, learner support, information provision, and learning tasks.
When utilizing e-learning platforms, learners can identify learner support and interactivity elements with over 80% accuracy.
Through project-based assessments, learners can concretize and submit strategies for improving e-learning quality.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
